amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, provides for a prison term of up to 10 years and/or a fine not to exceed $1 million as penalties for violation of the foreign contribution ban.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish a prison term for 5 to 20 years and a fine not to exceed $1 million as penalties for violation of the foreign contribution ban.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Smith (MI) to the Shays amendment (A002).

Smith (MI) amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent. A modification to establish a prison term of not more than 10 years and a fine not to exceed $1 million as penalties for violation of foreign contribution ban.
On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
